about_the_game:
El Norte Survival

Dive into the relentless challenges of the rugged northern Mexican wilderness in "El Norte Survival." This immersive survival game thrusts players into a harsh landscape where they must navigate the arid deserts, towering mountains, and treacherous canyons, all while battling the elements and other dangers that lurk in the shadows.

Key Features:

  • Stunning Biomes: Explore the beautifully rendered and diverse environments of northern Mexico, from scorching deserts to lush oases.

  • Resource Management: Scavenge for food, water, and materials to craft tools and build shelters.

  • Dynamic Weather Systems: Adapt to changing weather conditions, including brutal heatwaves, sudden sandstorms, and cold desert nights.

  • Wildlife Encounters: Face off against a variety of animals, some of which can be hunted for resources, while others pose a significant threat to your survival.

  • Realistic Survival Mechanics: Manage your character's health, hunger, thirst, and fatigue as you navigate the challenging terrain.

  • Crafting and Building: Utilize the resources you gather to create essential tools, weapons, and protective shelters.

  • Multiplayer Mode: Team up with friends in a cooperative multiplayer mode to increase your chances of survival.

Storyline:

You find yourself stranded in the unforgiving wilderness of northern Mexico, with nothing but your wits and the sparse resources around you. As you journey through this harsh environment, you'll uncover the secrets of the land and its history, making alliances and enemies along the way. Every decision you make will shape your path to survival.

Can you conquer the challenges of "El Norte Survival" and thrive in one of the most unforgiving landscapes on Earth?

name: El Norte Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 | AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 | AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 | AMD FX™-9590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM | AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in "El Norte Survival," a survival game set in the harsh deserts of northern Mexico. Explore stunning biomes, manage resources, face dynamic weather, and dangerous creatures. With multiplayer mode, crafting, and building, every decision is crucial for survival.
supported_languages:
English*, Catalan
*languages with full audio support
